column3: Latest;USA: A Cambodian singer of the ‘Golden Age’ of the 1960’s has died in a US hospital only a few days after a bad fall. Sieng Dy (later known as Princess Sieng Dy after marrying a member of the Sisowath family)
column4: was born in 1945 and was from a musical family
column5: with sisters So Sovinra and Sieng Vanthy also being famous voices of the era.------She died in Lakewood
column8: 2019.------The video below is from King Norodom Sihanouk’s film
